title: Isekai Risshiden - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Age Regression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Blacksmith   Carefree Protagonist   Character Growth   Child Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Elves   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kingdom Building   Lack of Common Sense   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Multiple POV   Overpowered Protagonist   Skill Assimilation   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: 小狐丸
description:
A very ordinary salaryman of around 40 woke up in a place he didn’t know. Also his body had regressed to a child’s body and he was on an island.

He was trained by a kind undead he met there and aims to go to a place where people live.>
